languages.text: {n}Смех Ирлиэт мягок и нежен, словно все тяготы ее судьбы растаяли в лучах местного светила.{/n} "Я боялась, что мой мир зачахнет. Превратится в пустыню или порастет сорной травой... Но он изменился. Кажется, в лучшую сторону".

{n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of a nearby star.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would have withered during this time. That it would have turned into a desert or become overgrown with weeds... But it changed. For the better, I think."
languages.original_text: {n}Смех Ирлиэт мягок и нежен, словно все тяготы ее судьбы растаяли в лучах местного светила.{/n} "Я боялась, что мой мир зачахнет. Превратится в пустыню или порастет сорной травой... Но он изменился. Кажется, в лучшую сторону".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of the local heavenly body.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would wither during this time. That it will turn into a desert or gets overgrown with weeds... But it has changed, For the better, I think."

{n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of a nearby star.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would have withered during this time. That it would have turned into a desert or become overgrown with weeds... But it changed. For the better, I think."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特温柔地笑了，仿佛命运的重担已经融化在临近星辰的辉光中。{/n}“我本担心在这段时间里，我的世界会逐渐枯萎。花园凋零为荒漠，杂草丛生……但并没有。看来它确实变了，变得更美了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of a nearby star.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would have withered during this time. That it would have turned into a desert or become overgrown with weeds... But it changed. For the better, I think."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特温柔地笑了，仿佛命运的重担已经融化在临近星辰的辉光中。{/n}“我本担心在这段时间里，我的世界会逐渐枯萎。花园凋零为荒漠，杂草丛生……但并没有。看来它确实变了，变得更美了。”

languages.text: {n}La risa de Yrliet es tierna y suave, como si los rayos de una estrella cercana hubiesen evaporado todo el peso de su sino.{/n} «Temía que mi mundo se hubiese agostado durante este tiempo. Que se hubiese transformado en un desierto o estuviese cubierto por la maleza... Pero ha cambiado. Y para mejor, creo».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of a nearby star.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would have withered during this time. That it would have turned into a desert or become overgrown with weeds... But it changed. For the better, I think."

traits.locale_text: {n}La risa de Yrliet es tierna y suave, como si los rayos de una estrella cercana hubiesen evaporado todo el peso de su sino.{/n} «Temía que mi mundo se hubiese agostado durante este tiempo. Que se hubiese transformado en un desierto o estuviese cubierto por la maleza... Pero ha cambiado. Y para mejor, creo».

languages.text: {n}Le rire d'Yrliet est doux et tendre, comme si le fardeau de son destin avait fondu sous les rayons d'une étoile lointaine.{/n} « J'avais peur que mon monde ait périclité après tout ce temps, qu'il se soit transformé en un désert aride ou qu'il soit noyé sous les mauvaises herbes... Il a bien changé, mais d'une façon positive, je pense. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of a nearby star.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would have withered during this time. That it would have turned into a desert or become overgrown with weeds... But it changed. For the better, I think."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rire d'Yrliet est doux et tendre, comme si le fardeau de son destin avait fondu sous les rayons d'une étoile lointaine.{/n} « J'avais peur que mon monde ait périclité après tout ce temps, qu'il se soit transformé en un désert aride ou qu'il soit noyé sous les mauvaises herbes... Il a bien changé, mais d'une façon positive, je pense. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliets Lachen ist sanft, als wäre die Bürde ihres Schicksals in den Strahlen eines nahen Sterns geschmolzen.{/n} "Ich hatte befürchtet, meine Welt wäre in der Zwischenzeit dahingeschwunden. Dass sie zu einer Wüste geworden wäre oder Unkraut sie überwuchert hätte ... Aber sie hat sich nur verändert. Zum Besseren, finde ich."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of a nearby star.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would have withered during this time. That it would have turned into a desert or become overgrown with weeds... But it changed. For the better, I think."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliets Lachen ist sanft, als wäre die Bürde ihres Schicksals in den Strahlen eines nahen Sterns geschmolzen.{/n} "Ich hatte befürchtet, meine Welt wäre in der Zwischenzeit dahingeschwunden. Dass sie zu einer Wüste geworden wäre oder Unkraut sie überwuchert hätte ... Aber sie hat sich nur verändert. Zum Besseren, finde ich."

languages.text: {n}ユリエットの笑いは柔らかく、優しく、まるで彼女の運命の重荷が近くの星の光線で溶けてしまったかのようだ。{/n}「この間に私の世界は枯れてしまったのではないかと心配だった。砂漠になるか、雑草が生い茂るかと…でも変わった。良い方向にね、おそらく」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of a nearby star.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would have withered during this time. That it would have turned into a desert or become overgrown with weeds... But it changed. For the better, I think."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットの笑いは柔らかく、優しく、まるで彼女の運命の重荷が近くの星の光線で溶けてしまったかのようだ。{/n}「この間に私の世界は枯れてしまったのではないかと心配だった。砂漠になるか、雑草が生い茂るかと…でも変わった。良い方向にね、おそらく」

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of a nearby star.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would have withered during this time. That it would have turned into a desert or become overgrown with weeds... But it changed. For the better, I think."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, kaderinin ağırlığı yakındaki bir yıldızın ışınlarıyla erimiş gibi yumuşak ve dokunaklı bir şekilde gülüyor.{/n} "Dünyamın bunca zamanda solup gideceğinden korkuyordum. Bir çöle döneceğini ya da yabani otlarla dolacağını sanıyordum... Fakat değişmiş, hem de bence eskisinden daha iyi durumda."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet's laugh is soft and tender, as if the burden of her fate has melted in the rays of a nearby star.{/n} "I was afraid that my world would have withered during this time. That it would have turned into a desert or become overgrown with weeds... But it changed. For the better, I think."

Bir çöle döneceğini ya da yabani otlarla dolacağını sanıyordum... Fakat değişmiş, hem de bence eskisinden daha iyi durumda."
